text: The 2019 FIBA Women's AmeriCup was held in San Juan, Puerto Rico from 22 to 29 September 2019. The United States won their third title by defeating Canada in the final. ==Venue== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" !San Juan |rowspan="4"| |- |Roberto Clemente Coliseum |- |Capacity: 9,000 |} ==Qualification== * Host nation ** * North America Subzone: ** (qualified automatically) ** (qualified automatically) * Central America and Caribbean Subzone: 2018 Centrobasket Women ** ** ** * South America Subzone: 2018 South American Basketball Championship for Women ** (Champion) ** ** ** ==Draw== The draw was held on 23 July 2019 in San Juan, Puerto Rico. {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="width: 20%;"|Pair 1 ! style="width: 20%;"|Pair 2 ! style="width: 20%;"|Pair 3 ! style="width: 20%;"|Pair 4 ! style="width: 20%;"|Pair 5 |- | | | | | |} ==Squads== Each team consisted of 12 players. ==Preliminary round== All times are local (UTC−4). ===Group A=== \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group B=== \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Knockout stage== ===Bracket=== ===Semifinals=== \---- ===Seventh place game=== ===Fifth place game=== ===Third place game=== ===Final=== ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" align=right |- | width="10" bgcolor="#ccffcc" | ||Qualified for Americas Pre-Qualifying Tournaments |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=180|Team !width=60|Record |- bgcolor="#ccffcc" | || align=left| || 6–0 |- bgcolor="#ccffcc" | || align=left| || 5–1 |- bgcolor="#ccffcc" | ||align=left| || 4–2 |- bgcolor="#ccffcc" |4 || align=left| || 3–3 |- bgcolor="#ccffcc" | 5 || align=left| || 3–2 |- bgcolor="#ccffcc" | 6 || align=left| || 2–3 |- bgcolor="#ccffcc" |7 || align=left| || 2–3 |- bgcolor="#ccffcc" | 8 || align=left| || 1–4 |- | 9 || align=left| || 0–4 |- | 10 || align=left| || 0–4 |} ==Statistics and awards== ===Statistical leaders=== ;Points {|class=wikitable width="90%" |- !width="80%"|Name !! width="20%"|SPG |- | Jenifer Muñoz ||align=center|2.8 |- | Bridget Carleton ||align=center|2.7 |- | Julady Zapata ||align=center|2.4 |- | Klavdia Calvo ||align=center rowspan=3|1.8 |- | Anisleidy Galindo |- | Manuela Ríos |} ===Awards=== The MVP was announced on 30 September 2019. {| class=wikitable style="margin:auto" !colspan=3 align=center|All-Star Team |- !Guard !Forwards !Centers |- |valign=center| Jordin Canada | Diamond DeShields Damiris Dantas | Kayla Alexander Sylvia Fowles |- |colspan=3 align=center|MVP: Sylvia Fowles |} ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:FIBA Women's AmeriCup Category:2019 in women's basketball Category:2018–19 in North American basketball Category:2018–19 in South American basketball Category:International women's basketball competitions hosted by Puerto Rico
